response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is worth $1,500,000 to you. To ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,350,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with substantial savings while securing a deal that aligns with both our business interests. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1350000}
